title: X LIST: "Captains"
body_text:
We're less than 2 months away from the summer blockbuster of 2015, the feverishly awaited
10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
of East Coast Dodgeball. In the lead to such an incredible milestone, that good ol' Writer has taken the hard-to-find time to compile a series of fitting "TOP 10" lists for your viewing pleasure. After all, who better to analyze, critique, and comprise than the omniscient mastermind who has seen
every
event spanning the last decade?
I think you'll find that this opening list -
The TOP 10 Most Conquering Captains
- is both statistically accurate and unbiased in  its research and presentation.
X. JOSEPH KELLY
▬ 4-match winning streak at events 38-41 ▬ inaugural "Captains Champion" ▬ notable opponents include Letsche & DeCuir
IX. DAN SPENGEMAN
▬ undefeated in singles matches with 3 wins ▬ 4th of 5 "triple crown" of captaincy winner ▬ won first and only father-son team contest ▬ never fought the same opponent more than once; notables include Pierce, Tronolone, Edwards, & Mullins
VIII. CHRIS ADAMS
▬ third best 8 total match victories ▬ record 2x
CREAMation
winner in 2+ matches ▬ won first BoxBall Dodgeball match ▬ numerous upper-tier matches at major events against Fitzpatrick (4x), Tronolone, Megill, & Londono (3x), and K. Adams (2x).
VII. TOM ADAMS
▬ 5 of total 7 matches won ▬ only captain to headline Xmas & Tgiving events (won both) ▬ fought McCrorey, K. Adams, S. Adams, Bertsch, Tronolone, & Pierce once each
VI. JUSTIN PIERCE
▬ second best active streak of 5 matches without a loss ▬ won first 3v3 match at
ECD100
▬ only member of
ECDElite
to have never lost to another member ▬ unbeaten in major events versus T. Adams, Letsche, Tronolone, Fitzpatrick, C. Adams, & Edwards
V. MICHAEL EDWARDS
▬ 4-match winning streak to begin captains career; dethroned then-undefeated Megill is debut match ▬ won first 3v3 match at
ECD100
▬ many high-level matches at major events against Megill & Fitzpatrick (2x) and M. Butler, Tronolone, Letsche, K. Adams, C. Adams, & Pierce
IV. KEVIN FITZPATRICK
▬ fourth best 7 total match wins ▬ one 4-match winning streak ▬ toughest captains schedule of any competitor (4.3 out of 5) ▬ various contests versus C. Adams (4x), Tronolone & K. Adams (3x), Edwards (2x), and Katz, Pierce, Wolf, & Krott between events 19 and 200
III. JUAN LONDONO
▬ record 7 matches without a loss at 5 wins & 2 draws; streak remains active ▬ only captain to win
CREAMation
,
PickYourPoison
, and
GodMode Rules
matches ▬ 2nd of 5 "triple crown" winners and completed such in shortest amount of time at a mere 37 events ▬ notable contests versus Wolf, C. Adams, & Avakian (3x), DiBuccio (2x), and Megill
II. KEVIN MEGILL
▬ record-high 6.18 average games won per match ▬ record 7-1-1 in singles matches ▬ third best 8 total match victories ▬ has defeated all but one opponent he's ever faced ▬ two separate 3-match winning streaks ▬ numerous main event bouts against C. Adams & Tronolone (3x) and Wolf & Edwards (2x)
I. KEVIN ADAMS
▬ record 11 total match victories ▬ record 5-match winning streak ▬ 1st winner of the captaincy "triple crown" ▬ won first 2v2, 3v3, and
CREAMation
matches ▬ second-best 4x season finale headliner at events 10, 50, 100, & 200 ▬ many major contests against Tronolone (4x), Fitzpatrick, Cornero, & Letsche (3x), and C. Adams (2x)
________________________________________
_________________________
Stayed tuned for the next "X LIST" in the coming week!
body_html:
We're less than 2 months away from the summer blockbuster of 2015, the feverishly awaited 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY of East Coast Dodgeball. In the lead to such an incredible milestone, that good ol' Writer has taken the hard-to-find time to compile a series of fitting "TOP 10" lists for your viewing pleasure. After all, who better to analyze, critique, and comprise than the omniscient mastermind who has seen every event spanning the last decade?

I think you'll find that this opening list - The TOP 10 Most Conquering Captains - is both statistically accurate and unbiased in its research and presentation.


X. JOSEPH KELLY
▬ 4-match winning streak at events 38-41 ▬ inaugural "Captains Champion" ▬ notable opponents include Letsche & DeCuir

IX. DAN SPENGEMAN
▬ undefeated in singles matches with 3 wins ▬ 4th of 5 "triple crown" of captaincy winner ▬ won first and only father-son team contest ▬ never fought the same opponent more than once; notables include Pierce, Tronolone, Edwards, & Mullins

VIII. CHRIS ADAMS
▬ third best 8 total match victories ▬ record 2x CREAMation winner in 2+ matches ▬ won first BoxBall Dodgeball match ▬ numerous upper-tier matches at major events against Fitzpatrick (4x), Tronolone, Megill, & Londono (3x), and K. Adams (2x).

VII. TOM ADAMS
▬ 5 of total 7 matches won ▬ only captain to headline Xmas & Tgiving events (won both) ▬ fought McCrorey, K. Adams, S. Adams, Bertsch, Tronolone, & Pierce once each

VI. JUSTIN PIERCE
▬ second best active streak of 5 matches without a loss ▬ won first 3v3 match at ECD100 ▬ only member of ECDElite to have never lost to another member ▬ unbeaten in major events versus T. Adams, Letsche, Tronolone, Fitzpatrick, C. Adams, & Edwards

V. MICHAEL EDWARDS
▬ 4-match winning streak to begin captains career; dethroned then-undefeated Megill is debut match ▬ won first 3v3 match at ECD100 ▬ many high-level matches at major events against Megill & Fitzpatrick (2x) and M. Butler, Tronolone, Letsche, K. Adams, C. Adams, & Pierce

IV. KEVIN FITZPATRICK
▬ fourth best 7 total match wins ▬ one 4-match winning streak ▬ toughest captains schedule of any competitor (4.3 out of 5) ▬ various contests versus C. Adams (4x), Tronolone & K. Adams (3x), Edwards (2x), and Katz, Pierce, Wolf, & Krott between events 19 and 200

III. JUAN LONDONO
▬ record 7 matches without a loss at 5 wins & 2 draws; streak remains active ▬ only captain to win CREAMation, PickYourPoison, and GodMode Rules matches ▬ 2nd of 5 "triple crown" winners and completed such in shortest amount of time at a mere 37 events ▬ notable contests versus Wolf, C. Adams, & Avakian (3x), DiBuccio (2x), and Megill

II. KEVIN MEGILL
▬ record-high 6.18 average games won per match ▬ record 7-1-1 in singles matches ▬ third best 8 total match victories ▬ has defeated all but one opponent he's ever faced ▬ two separate 3-match winning streaks ▬ numerous main event bouts against C. Adams & Tronolone (3x) and Wolf & Edwards (2x)

I. KEVIN ADAMS
▬ record 11 total match victories ▬ record 5-match winning streak ▬ 1st winner of the captaincy "triple crown" ▬ won first 2v2, 3v3, and CREAMation matches ▬ second-best 4x season finale headliner at events 10, 50, 100, & 200 ▬ many major contests against Tronolone (4x), Fitzpatrick, Cornero, & Letsche (3x), and C. Adams (2x)
_________________________________________________________________

Stayed tuned for the next "X LIST" in the coming week!
